history.proof: intros x y H. apply rel_prime_sym in H. hauto use: Zis_gcd_sym, Zis_gcd_minus, Z.opp_involutive unfold: rel_prime.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z H : rel_prime y x Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1840 (?M1841 * ?M1842) 1" with "Zis_gcd x (- y) 1".

In environment H0 : forall a b c : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime a c -> rel_prime a (b * c) x0, x : Z H3 : forall x1 : Z, (x1 | x * 1) -> (x1 | x0 * 1) -> (x1 | 1) Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (- ?M2819) (- ?M2820) 1" with "Zis_gcd (x0 * 1) (- (x * 1)) 1".

original: intros x y H. apply rel_prime_sym in H. apply rel_prime_mult. - apply rel_prime_sym. auto. - apply rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_opp. auto.
